PHRASE.LANG:
Here you can find the Street Moves characters and musical companion from Volume 3 in one affordable bundle. This Bundle includes. 


* Dance King (Male) 
 * DJ Spanner (Male) 
 * DJ Wrench (Female) 
 * Pom-Pom Princess (Female) 
 * Cheerleader Chic (Female) 
 * Companion – Gramophone 
 

※ Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. [#Legal]

Ici, vous trouverez les personnages et le compagnon musical du volume 3 de Danse de rue, dans un seul lot à prix abordable. Ce lot comporte : 


* Roi de la piste (Homme) 
 * DJ Molette (Homme) 
 * DJ Clé (Femme) 
 * Princesse Pom-Pom (Femme) 
 * Majorette chic (Femme) 
 * Danse de rue - Gramophone (Compagnon) 
 

※À l'achat, tous les objets seront ajoutés à leurs catégories correspondantes. [#Legal]

Hier findest du die Street-Moves-Figuren und musikalischen Begleiter aus Folge 3 in einem preisgünstigen Bundle. Dieses Bundle beinhaltet: 


* Dance King (männlich) 
 * DJ Maulschlüssel (männlich) 
 * DJ Nuss (weiblich) 
 * Pom-Pom-Prinzessin (weiblich) 
 * Cheerleader-Chick (weiblich) 
 * Street Moves - Grammofon (Begleiter) 
 

※Nach dem Kauf werden alle Gegenstände ihren jeweiligen Kategorien hinzugefügt. [#Legal]

Qui puoi trovare i personaggi e i compagni musicali del volume 3 di Street Moves in un pacchetto unico ed economico. Il pacchetto include: 


* Re del ballo (uomo) 
 * DJ Spanner (uomo) 
 * DJ Wrench (donna) 
 * Principessa pompon (onna) 
 * Bella cheerleader (donna) 
 * Street Moves - Grammofono (compagno) 
 

※Dopo l'acquisto, gli articoli verranno aggiunti alle categorie corrispondenti. [#Legal]

Te presentamos un lote, a un precio módico, que incluye los personajes y el compañero musical del volumen 3 de Movimientos callejeros. En él se incluyen: 


* El rey del baile (hombre) 
 * DJ Spanner (hombre) 
 * DJ Wrench (mujer) 
 * Princesa Pompón (mujer) 
 * Cheerleader (mujer) 
 * Movimientos callejeros: gramófono (compañero) 
 

※Al finalizar la compra, los objetos se añadirán a sus categorías correspondientes.[#Legal]

Here you can find the Street Moves characters and musical companion from Volume 3 in one affordable bundle. This Bundle Includes. 
 

* Dance King (Male) 
 * DJ Spanner (Male) 
 * DJ Wrench (Female) 
 * Pom-Pom Princess (Female) 
 * Cheerleader Chic (Female) 
 * Companion – Gramophone 
 

※ Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. [#Legal]

여기서 여러분은 하나의 저렴한 번들로 Street Moves의 Volume 3에 포함된 캐릭터와 음악 컴패니언을 만나보실 수 있습니다. 이 번들에는 다음 아이템이 포함됩니다.


* 댄스 킹 (남성) 
 * DJ 스패너 (남성) 
 * DJ 렌치 (여성) 
 * 폼폼 프린세스 (여성) 
 * 치어리더 걸 (여성) 
 * Street Moves - 축음기 (컴패니언) 


※ 구매하면 모든 아이템들은 해당 카테고리에 추가됩니다. [#Legal]

Here you can find the Street Moves characters and musical companion from Volume 3 in one affordable bundle. This Bundle Includes. 
 

* Dance King (Men) 
 * DJ Spanner (Men) 
 * DJ Wrench (Women) 
 * Pom-Pom Princess (Women) 
 * Cheerleader Chic (Women) 
 * Street Moves - Gramophone (Companion) 


※ Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. [#Legal]

你可以在這Vol. 3優惠組合包內找到幾位Street Moves角色和音樂隨身夥伴。本組合包包括以下道具。


* 舞王（男用） 
 * DJ騎士（男用） 
 * DJ騎士（女用） 
 * 啦啦球公主（女用） 
 * 啦啦隊辣妹（女用） 
 * Street Moves - 留聲機 (隨身夥伴） 
 

※購買後，各道具將被置於對應的類別內。[#Legal]
